statement.p: In 18.92 of the last 37 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{37}}={0.1892}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{37}. \displaystyle{P}={0.1892}\cdot{37}={7.0004}. We round that as requested to 7 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
